entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow mixed with rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snow mixed with rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 25 April 2023
